entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of showers. High 23. POP 30%
entry.summary: Sunny. Increasing cloudiness this afternoon then 30 percent chance of showers late this afternoon. Risk of a thunderstorm late this afternoon. Wind becoming south 20 km/h gusting to 40 this afternoon. High 23. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PDT Tuesday 03 May 2016

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of showers. Low 9. POP 70%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 70 percent chance of showers changing to 30 percent chance of showers near midnight. Risk of a thunderstorm early this evening. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low 9. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PDT Tuesday 03 May 2016
